◆ dropped_frames

size_t Logs::dropped_frames = 0

The count of frames that existed before the given history but were dropped.

◆ frames

std::deque<std::shared_ptr<Packet::LogFrame> > Logs::frames

A list of all log frames. This will contain at most kMaxLogFrames frames.

This should not be accessed from the Processor thread, other than to add frames. The container may be accessed by the MainWindow thread while the Context mutex is locked, and frames may be retained and used even while the mutex is not locked (provided a shared_ptr is kept).
